pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, May 9, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Niagara Falls, Ontario

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks, and participate in a Q&A at the Canadian Home Buildersâ€™ Association National Conference.

Scotiabank Convention Centre
6815 Stanley Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 7:45 a.m.

Milton, Ontario

8:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a community Iftar dinner, and will deliver remarks.

Milton Banquet and Conference Centre
3090 Steeles Avenue West

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 7:30 p.m.
